description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the user registration screen, including UI elements, state management, and registration logic with provider integration.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the registration screen.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form, user input controllers, and submission logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text editing controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the registration process by invoking the AuthProvider's register method and handling navigation or error display.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the registration form UI with input fields and a submit button.
